[I never got that message involving Skyscream and Megatron, and the name of 
the character here is Optimal Prime.]

"Oh really Motormaster, well can a ghost do this?" Optimal Prime's chest 
guns extended and fired off two shots near Motormaster, making the ground 
explode and leave a big crater.


>From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [NBWRPG] Re: Decepticon vs Decepticon
>Date: Thu, 03 May 2001 20:44:20 -0700
>
>OOC: I dont know about this arm loosing :) his armour is pretty tough
>though. Scorpius, could you reply to Megatron's attack on Skyscream.
>
>Motormaster turned from his firing, and his jaw hung at Optimus Prime.
>"You, You're a lot bigger than I remember" he said, loosing his
>composure. He then gritted his teeth and remembered what he was here
>for, "I dont have time for you ghost, get lost" Motormaster replied,
>spitting the words with discust.
